thread.title: Tourist bus slides off road near Akaroa
thread.title_full: Tourist bus slides off road near Akaroa

title: Tourist bus slides off road near Akaroa
text:
Tourist bus slides off road near Akaroa Last updated 17:44, February 22 2017 FAIRFAX NZ 
A tourist bus has reportedly crashed near Akaroa. 
A tourist bus has reportedly crashed off a steep road near Christchurch. 
Police said they were responding to reports a bus had slid off the edge of State Highway 75, near Akaroa, about 5pm on Wednesday. 
Do you know more? Email us at 
Dozens of people were believed to be on board the tourist bus, and at least one rescue helicopter was on route. 
A spokesman said the crash happened near the Hilltop Tavern between Barrys Bay and Little River. 
It was not yet known if anyone had been injured, but the spokesman said "people are getting out" of the vehicle. 
A Christchurch Transport Operations Centre spokesman said the highway remained open at this stage, but the situation could change.
